DOC.detailed_description: This study include patient 18 80 year experience acute traumatic cervical spinal cord injury ( specifically ASIA A , B C ) . Patients begin oral drug regimen Glyburide ( DiaBeta ) , must start within 8 hour injury continue 72 hour daily dose 3.125 mg Day 1 , 2.5 mg Day 2 2.5 mg Day 3 . If indicate , patient also surgical intervention spinal cord decompression spinal stabilization . Every one take part study labs draw adverse event assess Day 14 discharge ( whichever earlier ) , carefully monitor throughout hospitalization . Study participation last 365 day ( +/- 30 day ) , post-hospitalization follow occuring Days 28 , 42 , 84 , 182 365 .
